author: Rodney Dangerfield
quote: My psychiatrist told me I was crazy and I said I want a second opinion. He said okay, you're ugly too.

quote: When I was a kid my parents moved a lot, but I always found them.

quote: A homeless guy came up to me on the street, said he hadn't eaten in four days. I told him, "Man, I wish I had your willpower.

quote: I tell ya, I knew my morning wasn't going right. When I put on my shirt the button fell off, when I picked up my briefcase, the handle fell off, I tell ya, I was afraid to go to the bathroom.

quote: I told my wife a man is like wine, he gets better with age. She locked me in the cellar.

quote:
I asked my wife, 'On a scale of 1 to 10, how do you

quote: I told my psychiatrist that everyone hates me. He said I was being ridiculous - everyone hasn't met me yet.

quote: Guy goes into a bar with a duck under his arm. Bartender says, "Where'd you get the pig?" Guy says, "This is a duck." Bartender says, "I was talking to the duck."

quote: With my doctor, I don't get no respect. I told him I want a vasectomy. He said with a face like mine, I don't need one.

quote: On the way home one day, and I see a guy jogging down the street in his underwear. I ask, "Why are you jogging in your underwear?" He says, "You came home from work early".

quote: My doctor told me to watch my drinking. Now I drink in front of a mirror.

quote: I could tell my parents hated me. My bath toys were a toaster and a radio.

quote: I told my kids, "Someday, you'll have kids of your own." One of them said, "So will you."

quote: I drink too much. The last time I gave a urine sample it had an olive in it.

quote: I haven't spoken to my wife in years. I didn't want to interrupt her.

quote: Better to keep quiet and let people think you're an idiot than speak up and confirm it.

quote: It was the same thing in the army, no respect. They gave me a uniform that glowed in the dark.

quote: It's great to have gray hair. Ask anyone who's bald.

author: Rodney Dangerfield
quote: I'll tell ya, my wife and I, we don't think alike. She donates money to the homeless, and I donate money to the topless!

author: Rodney Dangerfield
quote: Once when I was lost I asked a policeman to help me find my parents. I said to him, "Do you think we'll ever find them?" He answered, "I don't know, kid. There are so many places they can hide."

author: Rodney Dangerfield
quote: I've never been lucky. The day my ship came in, I was at the airport.

quote: With my old man I got no respect. He told me never take candy from a stranger unless he offered me a ride.

quote: I went to see my doctor... I told him, "Doctor, every morning when I get up and look in the mirror I feel like throwing up. What's wrong with me?" He said, "I don't know, but your eyesight is perfect."

author: Rodney Dangerfield
quote: I told my wife the truth. I told her I was seeing a psychiatrist. Then she told me the truth: that she was seeing a psychiatrist, two plumbers, and a bartender.

author: Rodney Dangerfield
quote: My wife isn't very bright. The other day she was at the store, and just as she was heading for our car, someone stole it! I said, "Did you see the guy that did it?" She said, "No, but I got the license plate."

quote: I can't figure women out. They put on makeup for three hours. They wear things that make them smaller. Things that make them bigger. Then they meet a man and they want truth.

quote: A girl phoned me the other day and said... 'Come on over, there's nobody home.' I went over. Nobody was home.

quote: Life is full of temporary situations, ultimately ending in a permanent solution.

quote: I bought a new Japanese car, I turned on the radio ... I don't understand a word they're saying.

quote: I had plenty of pimples as a kid. One day I fell asleep in the library. When I woke up, a blind man was reading my face.

quote: This morning when I put on my underwear I could hear the fruit-of-the-loom guys laughing at me.

quote: I feel sorry for short people, you know. When it rains, they're the last to know.

quote: We sleep in separate rooms, we have dinner apart, we take separate vacations - we're doing everything we can to keep our marriage together.

quote: I tell ya, I was an ugly kid. I was so ugly that my dad kept the kid's picture that came with the wallet he bought.

quote: I came from a real tough neighborhood. Why, every time I shut the window I hurt somebody's fingers.

quote: At my age I'm envious of a stiff wind.

quote: His breath is so bad why every time he smokes he blows onion rings.

quote: Me and my dad used to play tag, he'd drive!

quote: You can name your own salary in this business. I call mine Fred.

quote: When I was 3 years old, my parents got a dog. I was jealous of the dog, so they got rid of me.

quote: My cousin is gay, in school while other kids were dissecting frog, he was opening flies.

author: Rodney Dangerfield
quote: I have good looking kids. Thank goodness my wife cheats on me.

author: Rodney Dangerfield
quote: What a childhood I had, why, when I took my first step, my old man tripped me!

author: Rodney Dangerfield
quote: It's nice to be the best, but not when being the best brings out the worst in you.

author: Rodney Dangerfield
quote: I shouldn't tell jokes about my wife. she's attached to a machine that keeps her alive... The refrigerator.

author: Rodney Dangerfield
quote: If sex is a pain in the ass, then you're doing it wrong.

author: Rodney Dangerfield
quote: With girls, I don't think right. I had a date with one girl, she had mirrors all over her bedroom. She told me to come over and bring a bottle. I got Windex.

author: Rodney Dangerfield
quote: Last Halloween a kid tried to rip my face off. He thought it was a mask. Now it's different when I open the door the kids hand me candy.

author: Rodney Dangerfield
quote: My wife is always trying to get rid of me. The other day she told me to put the garbage out. I said to her I already did. She told me to go and keep an eye on it.

author: Rodney Dangerfield
quote: She was so fat that her bathtub has stretch marks.

author: Rodney Dangerfield
quote: My wife a great driver, she once hit a deer. It was in a zoo. There is a pair of shoes on the dashboard. They belong to the last guy she hit

author: Rodney Dangerfield
quote: I knew a girl so ugly, I took her to the top of the Empire State building and planes started to attack her.

author: Rodney Dangerfield
quote: My parents didn't like me. For bathtub toys they gave me a blender and a transistor radio.

author: Rodney Dangerfield
quote: If I could have dinner with anyone who lived in history, it would depend on the restaurant.

author: Rodney Dangerfield
quote: I looked up my family tree and found out I was the sap.

author: Rodney Dangerfield
quote: I used to date a girl from Buffalo. Why can't I meet a girl with normal parents?

author: Rodney Dangerfield
quote: With sex my wife thinks twice before she turns me down. Yeah, once in the morning and once at night.

author: Rodney Dangerfield
quote: It's tough to stay married. My wife says no because she's tired then stays up and reads her book.

author: Rodney Dangerfield
quote: Life's a short trip. You'll find out.

quote: I said to a girl I'd been seeing, come home with me, honey, and I'll show you where it's at. She said, You'd better, because the last time I could'nt find it.

quote: Once I opened up a fortune cookie and inside was the guy's cheque next to me I said hey buddy I got your cheque he said thanks.

quote: I once went out with this girl, she was no bargain either, she showed up with pigtails under her arms.

author: Rodney Dangerfield
quote: I'm a bisexual; I get it maybe twice a year.

quote: On Halloween, the parents sent their kids out looking like me.

quote: I know I'm not sexy. In high school I was voted Most Likely to masturbate.

quote: I knew a girl so ugly, they use her in prisons to cure sex offenders.

quote: My sex life is like shooting pool with a rope!

quote: My wife is so fat that when she lays on the beach the people feel sorry for her and try to roll her back into the water.

author: Rodney Dangerfield
quote: Oh, when I was a kid, I was poor. Christmas, I got no presents. Well, there was one Christmas, on our front lawn - Prancer and Dancer - they dropped off a little something.

quote: I was making love to my wife the other night, I looked up. She was on the phone.

quote: At certain times I like sex - like just before a cigarette.

quote: I tell ya, southern people, they always think you are hard-of-hearing. When you leave they say, "Y'all come back, ya hear?".

quote: Oh, this your wife, huh? A lovely lady. Hey baby, you must've been something before electricity.

quote: School is a place were you go to eat your lunch

quote: I asked him "Who said you could fool around with my wife" he said everybody.

quote: When it comes to sex, at my age I like threesomes. In case one of us dies.

author: Rodney Dangerfield
quote: I asked my wife if she enjoys a cigarette after sex and she said "No, one drag is enough".

quote: I once asked a policeman how far it was to the subway. he said, "I don't know, no one has ever made it".

author: Rodney Dangerfield
quote: I have three kids, one of each.

author: Rodney Dangerfield
quote: I tell ya I got a stupid son. That's one load that shoulda been shot on the wall.

author: Rodney Dangerfield
quote: You wanna have laughs? Do what I do. When I go through a tollbooth, I keep going. I tell the guy, The car behind me is paying for two.

author: Rodney Dangerfield
quote: My sex life is terrible; my wife put a mirror over the dog's bed. Actually she did put a mirror over our bed. She says she likes to watch herself laugh.

quote: One night I came home. I figured, let my wife come on. I'll play it cool. Let her make the first move. She went to Florida.

quote: I can't get no respect.

author: Rodney Dangerfield
quote: With girls I get no respect. A belly dancer told me I turned her stomach.

author: Rodney Dangerfield
quote: My mother never breast fed me, she told me she only liked me as a friend.

author: Rodney Dangerfield
quote: [on 8/24/04, before entering a Los Angeles hospital for heart valve replacement surgery] If things go right, I'll be there about a week, and if things don't go right, I'll be there about an hour and a half.

author: Rodney Dangerfield
quote: When I told my wife she was lousy in bed - she went out - she got a second opinion.

author: Rodney Dangerfield
quote: My wife made me join a bridge club... I jump off next Tuesday.

quote: I went to a gay bar, they wanted proof of sex so I showed them, they said it wasn't enough.

author: Rodney Dangerfield
quote: When I was a kid I got no respect. My mother breast fed me through a straw.

author: Rodney Dangerfield
quote: My kid wants to be a prison warden when he grows up so he can put thumb tacks on the electric chairs.

author: Rodney Dangerfield
quote: I told my doctor I got water on my knee, he gave me a sponge and raised his fee!

author: Rodney Dangerfield
quote: I came from a real tough neighborhood. On my street, the kids take hubcaps - from moving cars.

author: Rodney Dangerfield
quote: My car broke down just the other day, I called triple A, they came and towed me away!

author: Rodney Dangerfield
quote: I'll tell ya, I don't get no respect... The other day, I got back from a business trip. I got in a cab and said to the driver, "Hey! Take me to where the action is!" So ya know where he took me? He took me to my house!

author: Rodney Dangerfield
quote: My cousins gay, he went to London only to find out that Big Ben was a clock.

author: Rodney Dangerfield
quote: You live with life's disappointments and learn from them. At seventy-eight, I know it all.

author: Rodney Dangerfield
quote: My wife she's fat. Why, if she lost a few pounds, she'd be perfectly round.

quote: I tell ya, I know the best way to get girls. I hang out at women's prisons, and wait for parolees.

quote: Yeah, I know I'm ugly... I said to a bartender, "Make me a zombie." He said "God beat me to it."

author: Rodney Dangerfield
quote: With my wife I don't get no respect. I made a toast on her birthday to 'the best woman a man ever had.' The waiter joined me.

author: Rodney Dangerfield
quote: I once had a problem ... so I tried group sex. Now I have a new problem - who to thank.

author: Rodney Dangerfield
quote: I live in a bad neighborhood. Why, I saw two complete strangers share a taxi - yeah, one guy took the radio and the other guy took the tires.

author: Rodney Dangerfield
quote: I am the world's oldest teenager. I've never lost my youthful attitude.

quote: My dog learned how to beg by watching me through the bedroom door.

quote: Cars and women are a lot alike. They lie about the milage.

quote: I knew a girl so ugly that she was known as a two-bagger. That's when you put a bag over your head in case the bag over her head breaks.

quote: What a childhood I had. Once on my birthday my ol' man gave me a bat. The first day I played with it, it flew away.

author: Rodney Dangerfield
quote: People ask me how I got started? I was 12 years old, alone in my room, and I got started!

author: Rodney Dangerfield
quote: I tell ya, sex is getting harder all the time. Me and my wife were trying to have sex for hours last night and I finally gave up. I asked her, "what, you can't think of anybody either?"

quote: I was so poor growing up...if I wasn't a boy...I'd have nothing to play with.

quote: I was making love to this girl and she started crying. I said, "Are you going to hate yourself in the morning?" She said, "No, I hate myself now."

quote: Time and tide and hookers wait for no man.

quote: I'm sitting on top of the world, and I've got hemorrhoids.

quote: At twenty a man is full of fight and hope. He wants to reform the world. When he is seventy he still wants to reform the world, but he know he can't.

author: Rodney Dangerfield
quote: When I was born I brought no joy, my father said he wanted a boy!

quote: She was so fat that her clothes are made by Omar the tent maker.

author: Rodney Dangerfield
quote: It would be great if people never got angry at someone for doing something they've done themselves.

quote: When I go to a nude beach, I always take a ruler, just in case I have to prove something.

quote: My wife's so dumb, she got a nail in the spare!!

quote: One time my whole family played hide and seek. They found my mother in Pittsburgh!

quote: I got my first break and became a singing waiter at eighteen or nineteen. I couldn't make a living at it. I quit. Then I got married and sold aluminum siding. My wife had problems physically. It was not good.

quote: Life is just a bowl of pits.

quote: When I was kidnapped as a child my parents sent a letter to the hijackers. Pay 5,000 dollars or you'll have to keep him.

quote: Last time I saw a mouth like that, it had a hook in it.

quote: I'd like to get some new clothes, but I can't find a Big and Short store.

quote: I asked my wife if she would put out the garbage. she said why should I you never put out for me.

quote: My cousin is gay, I always tell him that in our family tree, he's in the fruit section.

quote: Everyone gets their rough day. No one gets a free ride. Today so far, I had a good day. I got a dial tone.

author: Rodney Dangerfield
quote: We lived in a neighborhood that was too rich for us. When I was young, I had to deliver groceries to the homes of the kids I went to school with. I had to go to the back doors to make the deliveries. It was embarrassing. That was one thing out of a hundred.
